title: The Many Faces of a Black Man: The Triumphs and Trials of Being a Black Man in America
description: The struggle for black men in America continues, despite achieving economic and political gains. The black man in America still have to grapple with marriage and relationship woes, while trying to stay connected to his children. Black leaders that convey the message of solidarity are persecuted by the media, and ridiculed for not being self-serving. This book is a reflection of the reality the black man experience daily, from success, drugs, unemployment, love, violence hopelessness, and political opportunities. This book is comprised of words that inspire and admonish Black men around the world, especially in America, to strive for excellence and do not give in to stereotypical views of your worth to your people.
author: Raymond Sturgis
